script_title.zh-CN: 异星工厂模组汉化工具 - Factorio Mods Locale Tool

script_author.en: Build.__1__  Coded by Mr.Jos  Email: sd7056333@163.com

tip_1.en:
1. This script is a tool to translate the newly-updated mods by using the 
text collected in loaded library, not mechanical translation.
tip_1.zh-CN: 1. 该脚本是用文本库中搜集到的文本来翻译新更新的模组，而不是机翻工具。

tip_2.en:
2. The zip files or folders which may contain mods can be also dragged onto 
this script directly to be identified and translated.
tip_2.zh-CN: 2. 可能包含模组的zip压缩包或文件夹也可以直接拖到这个脚本上，识别后即可翻译。

tip_3.en:
3. A list of mods in library with translation would be generated, if you 
draged the loaded library onto this script: __1__
tip_3.zh-CN: 3. 脚本可以根据汉化文本库生成一个带翻译的模组列表，把文本库拖到这个脚本上就可以了: __1__

tip_4.en:
4. If you translated or improved the text in mods, you could submit the 
revised and tested [MOD].zip to the author of loaded library, by whom your 
contribution would be shared easily. Here are the editable contents in mods: 
	[MOD]\info.json   -- "title" & "description"
	[MOD]\locale\__1__\*.cfg
	[MOD]\script-locale\__1__.cfg
tip_4.zh-CN:
4. 如果你翻译或改进了模组里的文本，你可以把修订并测试后的[MOD].zip压缩包提交给文本库作者，这样就能轻松地与其它玩家分享你的贡献。下面是模组中可编辑的内容: 
	[MOD]\info.json   -- "title"(译名) & "description"(简介)
	[MOD]\locale\__1__\*.cfg
	[MOD]\script-locale\__1__.cfg

path_scanning.en:
Please wait a moment, script is scanning this path: 
__1__

path_no_mod.en: No mod is found in the path.

path_finished.en: Finshed, a total of __1__ mod(s) have been transalted, taking __2__ seconds.
path_finished.zh-CN: 完毕，共汉化了 __1__ 个MOD，耗时 __2__ 秒。

trans_none.en: [__1__/__2__] No locale item needs to translate.

list_generating.en:
Please wait a moment, script is generating the list of mods in library with 
translated titles and descriptions: 
__1__\__2__
list_generating.zh-CN:
请稍等，正在生成文本库中的MOD列表（带译名和汉化简介）: 
__1__\__2__

list_finish.en: Finshed, a total of __1__ mod(s) have been listed, taking __2__ seconds.
list_finish.zh-CN: 完毕，共列出了 __1__ 个MOD，耗时 __2__ 秒。
